text: Jabulani Tsambo (14 September 1980 â€“ 24 October 2018), better known by his stage name Hip Hop Pantsula shortened to HHP (pronounced double "H" P) and his nickname Fatty was a South African Motswako rapper who performed in several languages, though mostly in Setswana. He co-owned Uzalo. His best known albums were Introduction (2000), Maf Town (2001), O Mang? (2003), YBA 2 NW (2005), Acceptance Speech (2007), Dumela (2009), Motswafrika (2011) and Motswako High School (2014). He was born in Mafikeng, North West, South Africa. Pantsula died on 24 October 2018 at the age of 38. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Rappers Category:South African musicians
title: Hip Hop Pantsula
